title: Sofa & Carpet Shampooing
description: Deep wet vacuum and shampooing to remove stains, dust, and allergens from fabrics.

title: Water Tank Cleaning
description: Mechanized de-watering, sludge removal, and UV sterilization for overhead and underground tanks.

title: Septic Tank Cleaning
description: Professional suction and disposal of septic waste using vacuum trucks.

title: Full House Deep Cleaning
description: Top-to-bottom cleaning for new or renovated homes, including floor scrubbing and window cleaning.

title: Glass & Facade Cleaning
description: High-rise glass cleaning for corporate buildings and showrooms.

title: Industrial & Corporate Cleaning
description: Contract-based cleaning services for factories, offices, and commercial spaces.
